TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PageSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定要套用到單一列印頁面的設定。

span.span: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來指定修改的方式，將列印頁的設定。The class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed. 通常您會設定所有頁面的預設設定，以透過列印屬性。Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the property. 若要指定網頁的網頁為基礎的設定，請處理或事件及修改引數包含在或分別。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. 如需有關處理事件，請參閱類別概觀。For more information about handling events, see the class overview. 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間的概觀。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 下列範例示範處理事件和檢查引數的。The following example demonstrates handling the event and checking the argument of . 若要使用此程式碼，加入名元件`PrintDocument1`至 Windows 表單和關聯其事件`printDocument1_PrintPage`在範例中的方法。To use this code, add a component named `PrintDocument1` to a Windows Form and associate its event with the `printDocument1_PrintPage` method in the example. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設的印表機來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 一般而言，您無法建立的執行個體，而是使用設定所有頁面的設定。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for all pages.

summary.span: 使用指定的印表機來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a specified printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化的新執行個體上類似和設定屬性。The constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of and setting the property.

span.span: Gets the size of the page, taking into account the page orientation specified by the property.

value.span: ，表示頁面的長度和寬度 (以百分之一英吋為單位)。

span.span: A that represents the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性連同屬性來計算頁面的列印區域。Use the property along with the property to calculate the printing area for the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Color { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出頁面是否應該以彩色列印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.

value.span: 如果頁面以彩色列印為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來判斷是否印表機支援彩色列印。You can use the property to determine if the printer supports color printing. 如果印表機支援彩色，但您不想用彩色來列印，請將設定屬性`false`。If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the property to `false`. 預設行為是`true`。The default will be `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印文件的第一頁中的色彩，如果印表機支援它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和被處理的事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 將相關資訊從 複製到指定的 結構。

span.span: Copies the relevant information from the to the specified structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，將複製相關資訊，以`DEVMODE`結構從。Call the method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a . 此方法相當實用，當您想要進行 unmanaged 的 Win32 呼叫需要`DEVMODE`。This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`. 若要複製資訊從`DEVMODE`結構以，呼叫。To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the , call .

summary.span: 取得位於頁面左側之強制邊界的 X 座標 (以百分之一英吋為單位)。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the left of the page.

value.span: 左側強制邊界的 X 座標 (以百分之一英吋為單位)。

span.span: The x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the left-hand hard margin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強制的邊界表示由印表機設定的實體邊界。The hard margin represents the physical margin set by the printer.

span.span: The y-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the top of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Landscape { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出橫印或直印頁面。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.

value.span: 如果必須橫印頁面為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來確定角度（角度），即縱向方向旋轉以產生橫向方向。You can use the property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定為透過橫向的文件的預設頁面方向屬性，並列印文件。The following code example sets a document's default page orientation to landscape through the property, and prints the document. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`的列印設為檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 方法，名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設定為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PageSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PageSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::Margins ^ Margins { System::Drawing::Printing::Margins ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::Margins ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個頁面的邊界。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins for this page.

value.span: ，表示頁面的邊界 (以百分之一英吋為單位)。

span.span: A that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.

value.span: 每一邊的預設值都是 1 英吋邊界。

span.span: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當處理事件時，您可以使用這個屬性連同屬性來計算頁面的列印區域。When handling the event, you can use this property along with the property to calculate the printing area for the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定預設文件的頁面設定為 1 英吋的邊界每一端上。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins to 1 inch on each side. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`的列印設為檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 方法，名為`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設定為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PaperSize ^ PaperSize { System::Drawing::Printing::PaperSize ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PaperSize ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個頁面的紙張大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
A that represents the size of the paper.

value.span: 預設為印表機的預設紙張大小。

span.span: The default is the printer's default paper size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A代表透過紙張大小屬性，其中包含的其中一個值。A represents the size of the paper through the property, which contains one of the values. 設定屬性頁面，即可有效，可透過集合。Set the property for the page to a valid , available through the collection. 如需您可以指定自訂紙張大小的方式，請參閱建構函式。For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面上，包括在選取的大小為基礎的紙張大小的三個屬性`comboPaperSize`下拉式方塊，然後列印文件使用方法。The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper size based upon the size selected in the `comboPaperSize` combo box, and then prints the document using the method. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`存在和存在於特定的下拉式方塊。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist. remarks.format: ## Remarks A代表透過紙張來源屬性，其中包含的其中一個值。A represents the source of the paper through the property, which contains one of the values. 設定屬性頁面，即可有效，可透過集合。Set the property for the page to a valid , available through the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面上，包括紙張來源中選取的來源為基礎的三個屬性`comboPaperSource`下拉式方塊，然後列印文件使用方法。The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper source based upon the source selected in the `comboPaperSource` combo box, and then prints the document using the method. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`存在和存在於特定的下拉式方塊。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist. summary.span: 取得印表機之頁面可列印區域的界限。

span.span: Gets the bounds of the printable area of the page for the printer.

value.span: ，表示印表機可列印區域的長度和寬度 (以百分之一英吋為單位)。

span.span: A representing the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the area the printer is capable of printing in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是否頁面方向為橫向或縱向屬性會傳回正確的值。The property returns the correct value, whether the page orientation is landscape or portrait. 若要列印的頁面上，但可列印區域邊界之外，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to print outside the margins of the page, but within the printable area.
